description:
**Fix Overview**:

Microsoft has addressed the issue, and you can apply the relevant update to resolve any associated problems resulting from the previous version of the software.

1. Ensure your system is connected to the internet.
2. Check for updates by navigating to Settings > Update & Security > Windows Update.
3. Install the latest updates provided by Microsoft to apply the fix.

**Details**:
This fix involves downloading and installing the updates provided by Microsoft. Please confirm that your system specifications meet the requirements for the updates installed. (LLM Synthesized)
